Pages.Name: npc_vehicledriver
Pages.Description: NPC used to drive a target vehicle.

InputOutputs.Name: StartFiring
InputOutputs.Description: Tell the driver to attack nearby enemies with the vehicle's weaponry (if any)

InputOutputs.Name: StopFiring
InputOutputs.Description: Tell the driver to stop attacking nearby enemies with the vehicle's weaponry.

InputOutputs.Name: GotoPathCorner
InputOutputs.Description: Tell the driver to go to a specific path corner and continue from there.

InputOutputs.Name: SetDriversMaxSpeed
InputOutputs.Description: Set the Maxspeed (percentage of vehicle's maxspeed).

InputOutputs.Name: SetDriversMinSpeed
InputOutputs.Description: Set the Minspeed (percentage of vehicle's maxspeed).

InputOutputs.Name: StartForward
InputOutputs.Description: Tell the driver to start driving.

InputOutputs.Name: Stop
InputOutputs.Description: Tell the driver to stop driving.
